title: Framework-Based Workshop for Strengthening Project-Based Learning (PBL) Design Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of software engineering and understanding of basic instructional design principles
context.additional_context: A process of applying a project-based learning design framework in an online LMS environment for graduate students in science, requiring flexible task design that considers workplace integration for working learners.

learning_goals: Learners can independently design real-world problem-solving projects in science using a 4-stage PBL design model.
Learners can develop assessment rubrics integrating domain-specific/general skills to measure learner performance.
Learners can execute an iterative design process to improve PBL activities by analyzing learning data.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
